original_text: That is, from the time when John was baptizing people until the time when Jesus went up to heaven. He must be someone who saw Jesus become alive again after he died, as we did.’
korean_text: 항상 우리와 함께 다니던 사람 중에 하나를 세워 우리와 더불어 예수께서 부활하심을 증언할 사람이 되게 하여야 하리라 하거늘

sentences.original_text: That is, from the time when John was baptizing people
sentences.korean_translation: 즉, 요한이 사람들에게 세례를 베풀던 때부터

sentences.original_text: until the time when Jesus went up to heaven.
He must be someone who saw Jesus become alive again
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 예수님께서 다시 살아나신 것을 본 사람이어야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: after he died, as we did.'
sentences.korean_translation: 죽으신 후에 다시 살아나신 것을 우리와 같이 본 사람이어야 합니다.
